metadata.title: CVE-2018-10895 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
qutebrowser before version 1.4.1 is vulnerable to a cross-site requestforgery flaw that allows websites to access 'qute://*' URLs. A maliciouswebsite could exploit this to load a 'qute://settings/set' URL, which thensets 'editor.command' to a bash script, resulting in arbitrary codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10895` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

qutebrowser - 1.1.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qutebrowser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.1-1ubuntu0.1').
